Social And Cultural Activities: Arranged medical camps, sports tournaments (indoor-outdoor) and training centre for banking industry employees; fighting for justice to the poor, uneducated and downtrodden; organising people for their social and economic progress; redressing the grievances of the suppressed people
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Listening to music , reading and watching T.V.
Educational Qualifications: B.Com. Educated at Shivaji University, Kolhapur(Maharashtra)
